Room.Name: Public Room Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a hallway connecting the vestibule of the Dragon Tooth Inn to the Public Room. If you are seeking the new owner of this fine inn, you wiill find him practicing his bartending skills just off the hallway to the south. If you need to relieve yourself, the restrooms are also located in the hallway to the south. Directly east is the vestibule and main entry.
